recipe.title: Brandy Alexander Shake
ingredients: 2 ounces (1/4 cup) brandy, or to taste
2 ounces (1/4 cup) crème de cacao, or to taste
instructions: In a blender, blend ice cream, brandy and crème de cacao until smooth but still thick. Pour mixture into 2 chilled stemmed glasses and garnish with nutmeg.
